trends: There have been no other sightings in gulf of mexico
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: was on a tilt,then went horizontle,very bright,then just blinked out
divs: Sighting Detailsthe object was just above the the water,on a tilt,it stayed there for about a minute,then slowly went horizontle,it "s colour was a bright orange(the light look like it was spinning,it looked almost alive with colour). this was on a fishing trip that i was on,i was on the starboard side when myself and six other"s saw this object,it was 2:48 am,i notice the object when it just appear in the dark night sky,it"s really dark out on the gulf of mexico at night,it was like instant light that appeared,very bright orange,beautifull colour,it was not an oil rig,space shuttle,plane ,blimp or other vessal,i know what they look like out there at night.i reached for my camara to take a picture but the battery"s were dead, they were new,and i had 12 shot"s left on the roll,after that about a few seconds went by and it just blink out,gone.the battery"s on the camara were brand new from the tackle shop when i got them they were only in the camara for a few hours and worked untill then,even the light"s on the boat dimmed before the object blinked out,i am still beside myself about this,ever since this sighting i fell differant, like when i am out fishing at night ,i being watched,(iam not crazy like when i tell other what i saw).i just want to know what was this and why did it show it self to me?
